Package TradingPlatform

Class ITAdministrator

java.lang.Object
TradingPlatform.User
TradingPlatform.ITAdministrator
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserDataSource
public class ITAdministrator
extends User
An IT Administrator is a user that has extra permissions to manage Organisational units and users.

    Creates a new IT administrator with a username and password, and assigns them to the IT Administrators Organisational Unit (the unit of this IT admin).

    • ITAdministrator

      public ITAdministrator​(int userID)
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • CreateNewMember

      public boolean CreateNewMember​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String hashedPassword, OrganisationalUnit unit)
      Creates a new user and assigns them passwords and an organisational unit.
      Parameters:
      username - User's username
      hashedPassword - User's hashed password
      unit - Organisational unit that the user belongs to

    • CreateNewITAdmin

      public boolean CreateNewITAdmin​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String hashedPassword)
      Creates a new IT administrator with a username and password, and assigns them to the IT Administrators Organisational Unit (the unit of this IT admin).
      Parameters:
      username - Admin's username
      hashedPassword - Admin's hashed password

    • CreateOrganisationalUnit

      public int CreateOrganisationalUnit​(java.lang.String unitName)
      Creates a new organisational unit and adds it to the server.
      Parameters:
      unitName - The name of the new organisational unit.
      Returns:
      the orgUnitId of the created org, or -1 on failure.

    • EditOrganisationalUnitCredits

      public void EditOrganisationalUnitCredits​(OrganisationalUnit orgUnit, int credits)
      Edits the number of credits an organisational orgUnit has.
      Parameters:
      orgUnit - The orgUnit that will be edited.
      credits - The new amount of credits the orgUnit will have.

    • EditOrganisationalAsset

      public void EditOrganisationalAsset​(OrganisationalUnit orgUnit, AssetType assetType, int numAsset)
      Edits the number of an asset that an organisational unit has.
      Parameters:
      orgUnit - The organisation unit that will be edited.
      assetType - The type of asset that will be edited.
      numAsset - The new number of the asset that the organisation unit will have.

    • CreateNewAssetType

      public void CreateNewAssetType​(java.lang.String assetName)
      Creates a new asset type, and adds it to the database.
      Parameters:
      assetName - The name of the asset.

    • ChangeUserPassword

      public boolean ChangeUserPassword​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String newHashedPassword)
      Updates the given user's password.
      Parameters:
      username - the user who's password will be changed
      newHashedPassword - the hash of the user's new password

    • GetAllOrgUnits

      public static java.util.ArrayList<OrganisationalUnit> GetAllOrgUnits()
      Gets the details of all the organisational units. This method is in this class, because it is only used on the Administrator page for combo box drop downs.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of all the organisational units.

    • getAccountType

      public AccountType getAccountType()
      Specified by:
      getAccountType in interface UserDataSource
      Overrides:
      getAccountType in class User
      Returns:
      The user's account type (Member or Admin).
